author: rdonkin
msg: Reverting changes that i accidentally put into digester rather than logging. Cut-and-paste is like drinking fifteen pints - every time you do it, you wake up and say 'never again' but that's all forgotten by next friday.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added maven build (aimed at documentation). This isn't totally satisfactory (for example, I've stripped out the unit tests) and the user guide formatting isn't brilliant. But i feel that i want to be able to get some feedback and there are some other priorities. i'll try to get to this work later.
